name: nuclide-ocaml
description: Provides support for OCaml in Nuclide
author: NEEDS OWNER

pathToMerlin.title: Path to Merlin Executable. Note that Atom configs aren't used for remote Nuclide.

pathToRefmt.title: Path to refmt, the Reason formatter.

refmtFlags.title: Additional flags to pass to refmt

pathToOcpIndent.title: Path to ocp-indent, the OCaml formatter. If no path is given, will use the server default ('ocp-indent')

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Specify the level of logging. (restart to take effect)
